page.title: 18The Epworth Society.
page.content: The Epworth Society's main aims are to conserve that which is good in the village and to make improvements where it is deemed necessary. Whenever plans are submitted affecting The Conservation Area in Epworth or any Listed Building, the Local Planning Authority must consult The Society. In September a Heritage/ Information Centre is due to be opened in a listed building in The Market Place. Artefacts and photographs from bygone days will be exhibited and information will be available on local places of interest. It will be manned by volunteers from the society, membership of which is now approximately one hundred.
